client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Snapchat Client ID for API credentials.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The Client Secret for a given Client ID.

refresh_token.title: API Refresh Token
refresh_token.description: Refresh Token to get next api key after expiration. Is given with API Key

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The start date to sync data. Leave blank for full sync. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.
